ROOT.GetStationCoordinate: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE,s.PG_ID as GRID_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE,s.connective_pg_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE,s.pg_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s
ROOT.WhereTimeKey: ((FAULT_TIME<{2} AND FAULT_TIME>={1}) OR (FAULT_TIME<{1} AND (RESUME_TIME>{1}))) AND FAULT_DETAIL LIKE '%{0}%'
ROOT.GetTransFault: select FAULT_ID,'PWRTRANSFM' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.name as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,FT.NAME AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,RESUME_TIME,D.ST_ID ,PH.NAME AS FAULT_PHASE,FR.NAME AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,R.NAME AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,s.name AS ST_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FT ON F.FAULT_TYPE=FT.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_ACPHASE PH ON F.FAULT_PHASE=PH.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FR ON F.FAULT_RESULT=FR.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_DUTYCATEGORY R ON F.REASON_CLASS=R.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v ON d.voltage_type=v.code LEFT JOIN (same:GetStationCoordinate) s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE {0} ORDER BY FAULT_TIME DESC
ROOT.GetBusFault: select FAULT_ID,'BUSBAR' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.name as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,FT.NAME AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,RESUME_TIME,D.ST_ID ,PH.NAME AS FAULT_PHASE,FR.NAME AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,R.NAME AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,s.name AS ST_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BUSBAR_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FT ON F.FAULT_TYPE=FT.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_ACPHASE PH ON F.FAULT_PHASE=PH.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FR ON F.FAULT_RESULT=FR.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_DUTYCATEGORY R ON F.REASON_CLASS=R.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_busbar_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v ON d.voltage_type=v.code LEFT JOIN (same:GetStationCoordinate) s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE {0} ORDER BY FAULT_TIME DESC
ROOT.GetConverterFault: select FAULT_ID,'CONVERTER' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.name as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,FT.NAME AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,RESUME_TIME,D.ST_ID ,'' AS FAULT_PHASE,FR.NAME AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,R.NAME AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,s.PG_ID AS GRID_ID,s.name AS ST_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERTER_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FT ON F.FAULT_TYPE=FT.CODE /*LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_ACPHASE PH ON F.FAULT_PHASE=PH.CODE*/ LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FR ON F.FAULT_RESULT=FR.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_DUTYCATEGORY R ON F.REASON_CLASS=R.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERTER_B d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DCPOLE_B POLE ON D.DCPOLE_ID=POLE.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v ON d.voltage_type=v.code LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s ON POLE.st_id=s.id WHERE {0} ORDER BY FAULT_TIME DESC
ROOT.GetGeneratorFault: select top 100 FAULT_ID,'GENERATOR' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.name as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,FT.NAME AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,RESUME_TIME,D.ST_ID ,'PH.NAME' AS FAULT_PHASE,FR.NAME AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,R.NAME AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,s.name AS ST_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GENERATOR_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FT ON F.FAULT_TYPE=FT.CODE /*LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_ACPHASE PH ON F.FAULT_PHASE=PH.CODE*/ LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FR ON F.FAULT_RESULT=FR.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_DUTYCATEGORY R ON F.REASON_CLASS=R.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v ON d.voltage_type=v.code LEFT JOIN (same:GetStationCoordinate) s ON d.st_id=s.id WHERE {0} ORDER BY FAULT_TIME DESC
ROOT.GetAcLineFault: select FAULT_ID,'ACLINE' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.NAME as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,FT.NAME AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,RESUME_TIME,EQUIP_ID as ST_ID ,PH.NAME AS FAULT_PHASE,FR.NAME AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,R.NAME AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,g.NAME_ABBREVIATION from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FT ON F.FAULT_TYPE=FT.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_ACPHASE PH ON F.FAULT_PHASE=PH.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FR ON F.FAULT_RESULT=FR.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_DUTYCATEGORY R ON F.REASON_CLASS=R.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v ON d.voltage_type=v.code LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_pwrgrid_b g ON d.grid_id=g.id WHERE {0} ORDER BY FAULT_TIME DESC

FAULT_PHASE,'' AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,'' AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,s.name AS ST_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN FAULT_PHASE,'' AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,'' AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,s.name AS ST_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BUSBAR_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN FAULT_PHASE,'' AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,'' AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,s.name AS ST_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GENERATOR_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN AS FAULT_PHASE,'' AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,'' AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,g.NAME_ABBREVIATION from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN sg_con_pwrgrid_b g ON d.grid_id=g.id WHERE {0} UNION ALL select FAULT_ID,'DCLINE' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.NAME as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,'' AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,RESUME_TIME,GRID_ID as ST_ID ,'' AS FAULT_PHASE,'' AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,'' AS REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,GRID_ID,g.NAME_ABBREVIATION from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_pwrgrid_b g ON d.grid_id=g.id WHERE {0} UNION ALL select FAULT_ID,'CONVERTER' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.name as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,'' AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,RESUME_TIME,D.ST_ID ,'' AS FAULT_PHASE,'' AS FAULT_RESULT,FAULT_TYPE,'' REASON_CLASS,REASON_DESC,s.PG_ID AS GRID_ID,s.name AS ST_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERTER_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERTER_B d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DCPOLE_B POLE ON D.DCPOLE_ID=POLE.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v ON d.voltage_type=v.code LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s ON POLE.st_id=s.id WHERE {0} ) ORDER BY FAULT_TIME DESC
ROOT.GetFaultState: SELECT d.st_id,F.FAULT_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id same:WhereState UNION ALL select d.st_id,F.FAULT_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_BUSBAR_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_busbar_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id same:WhereState UNION ALL select d.st_id,F.FAULT_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GENERATOR_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id same:WhereState UNION ALL select F.EQUIP_ID,F.FAULT_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H_FAULT F same:WhereState UNION ALL select F.EQUIP_ID,F.FAULT_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_H_FAULT F same:WhereState UNION ALL select POLE.st_id,F.FAULT_ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERTER_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERTER_B d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_DCPOLE_B POLE ON D.DCPOLE_ID=POLE.ID same:WhereState
